title: Application System Engineer (Full Stack Developer)
responsibilities: Responsible for company visual website development and cloud deployment
Execute website maintenance operations, including SSL certificate updates and system maintenance
Integrate payment gateway systems and maintain event check-in systems
Develop and implement BPM (Business Process Management) systems

title: Event Specialist (Event Planner)
responsibilities: Plan tourist factory guided tour content, curriculum development and event planning
Responsible for official website construction and operation, execute outreach promotion work
Serve as secretary to the chairman of Taichung Industrial Story Museum Development Association, participate in association event planning
Host foreign guests and government officials from various sectors, serve as frontline tour guide

title: Project Executive (Marketing Planner)
responsibilities: Co-founded brand planning design studio, focusing on brand strategy development
Create educational materials and serve as teaching assistant for business management department at NPUST
Provide market competitor analysis and brand planning consulting services
Manage social media (Facebook, Instagram) and develop e-commerce strategies
Successfully completed multiple client projects, including Pingtung wax apple agricultural brand planning
